- The British Library and the Arts and Humanities Research Council  published a report on skills: [Scoping Skills and Developing Training Programme for Managing Repository Services in Cultural Heritage Organisations](https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.23636%2Fnyee-xt63&data=05%7C01%7Cp.a.f.verhaar%40library.leidenuniv.nl%7C8c67963bd3a647e3b5dd08dbb51fc510%7Cca2a7f76dbd74ec091086b3d524fb7c8%7C0%7C0%7C638302921120095919%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Y3sfmGiLDufafFkxbGBAUahgj%2F40nkChK97cH6NqD74%3D&reserved=0).
